title: AP mage tank vs pure tank Zac
body:
I always build some tank mage items first to give early game pressure / damage because I find the pure tank too reliant on the abilities of your team mates which in yolo Q has been unreliable (in my experience). Tank items late game.

Thoughts? What is the tradeoff between pure tanky team utility / early game AP dominance for a zac jg?

replies.body: You already know how I feel about this XD

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EeIOz5gZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-02T08:02:10.631+0000)
>
> You already know how I feel about this XD

;)

I just feel that I have more impact in yoloQ as AP transitioning to late game AP tank.
I don't know if it's that good anymore because you're most damaging ability is your e which has been made much much easier to dodge
Ap zac, hes flies in and fucks yo shit up also seems incredibly useful being able to apply so much dam/cc to the enemy teams backline

I build the ap jungle item on zac and then decide on weather more ap is okay mostly proto belt or to go all tank items from the ap jungle item. 

I only go the tank jungle item if we have no tanks and are losing early.
